about_desc1: This app was originally developed by Fredrik Johansson, Växjö Kommun Kungsmadskolan, Sweden as a possible answer about how to work with digital education, from another perspective than just online text and online courseware.
about_desc2: This tool works best close coupled with Google classroom. It is intended to add functionality, such as a reading test, glossary/word training via plugins.
about_lic_desc1: All the code for this app is released as open source and can be found on github.com/mumme74/trainee.
about_lic_desc2: License for the source code of the backend (server) and the frontend (browser) code is Licensed under MIT permissive License.
